alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A developing thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dracut, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and potential funnel cloud formation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor urban flooding and a funnel cloud. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Reading, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford, North Reading, Tyngsborough, Boxford, Groveland, and Dunstable. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex
